File _ doesn\'t exist. Try to redownload additional data

To make app compatible with Android 11 (Android R), there was data structure change. So you may have to re-download some additional data. Don't worry, it will automatically handle abandoned files.

 App will leave old BCU (/storage/emulated/0/BCU/) folder where user data is stored (ex. Images). You can use them or it's fine to remove them if you don't matter.

 Thanks for using BCU Android.
Pack _ is not allowed because it can affect app

" Summoned regardless of limitation of stage)"

" Summoned on every kill in front of target"

This action will delete current pack file
This action will make app ignore conflict, but be aware that this action may make app crash
This action can make app crash
This pack file is corrupted, so app couldn\'t load data from it. It will be removed automatically.
Several pack files have same ID, so you have to choose one of these pack files by selecting drop down menu above. Other pack files will be removed.
Several pack files have same ID
This conflict cannot be solved because app couldn\'t get proper information
App couldn\'t get information from pack file. You have to manually remove them with external file browser.
Adds _% of base atk to damage dealt

You can\'t use gold CPU in this stage
"Asset has been corrupted\n\nAssets contain BC data, which is very critical for app to be run. It seems app failed to download asset files or was interrupted by any factors, so assets got corrupted "

1. Go to setting of your system, application, and select BCU Android. Tab button below to access it easily
2. Reset data. This means you will have to redownload assets again

- When you downloading assets, do not switch to other app, or turn off the screen. Make app keep running until the download finishes

BCU needs to downlod BC data and other required additional assets to perform its job properly. You won\'t need internet once you downloaded all required files, so please connect to internet, and turn the application on
It seems internet speed is too low, or BCU took too long time to connect to server. Please try again with another internet configuration
BCU failed to connect to server for checking updates. This can be because of your proxy setting. Please change your proxy setting
Connection has been closed due to unknown reason. This can be because internet status change, or interruption between server and BCU. Please retry with more stable internet status
Failed to import selected file (Permission denied)
Failed to import selected file (No such file)
Connection failed because server is either unavailable, or denied. This can be because server is under maintenance, or server denied because of proxy settings

Language data has been corrupted\n\nLanguage data is cruicial text data which is used for displaying unit/enemy/stage names, descriptions, and so on. It seems app downloaded language data in incorrect order due to any factors, so language data reading code caused error
1. Tap button below to reset language data\n- This doesn\'t reset whole app\'s data, so don\'t worry\n2. App will be closed once reset is done. Restart app to redownload language data again
You can only import png or jpg files
Wrong Image size (_owx_oh). Has to be (_nwx_nh)
Do you want to delete this animation? This can\'t be undone.
Choose Animation Type (Cannot be changed later)

Increases damage dealt to Colossal enemies by _%, and lowers damage taken from them by -%.
